segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout first, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing away, focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the faucet pouring water nonstop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin's full, overflowing in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water hits the floor, forming a puddle around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinets reveal the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy’s on the stool, reaching right in for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool’s legs are splayed, looking unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate with his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, arm up, waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's attentive, like she's part of the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden path and bushes look neat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how calm outside is compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
